task.title: How to Write a Welcome Post
task.shortdesc: It’s important for page members to know who monitors the company's LinkedIn page to build brand trust. After becoming page admin, introduce yourself to page members with a welcome post.

prereq.p: To successfully write and publish a welcome post on LinkedIn, ensure you have access to a computer, stable internet connection, your job description, digital copy of your headshot, and access to your company page.

step.cmd: Log into your personal LinkedIn account.
Located the company page on the left-hand side of your browser.
Click on the name of the company page.
Click the blue "+ Create" button and then select "Start a Post.”
Add text written in third-person containing the following information:

substep.cmd: Exclaimation of excitement for the job.
